A Swansea University graduate who has achieved First Class Honours in BSc Economics currently working as an Associate Data Analyst at Just Eat Takeaway.com. Previously worked part-time with CheckoutSmart as a Business Analyst after a successful year working on placement with the company. A personable character who is motivated by helping and supporting others. Praised as being able to work efficiently in teams or on own initiative. Incredibly reliable and trustworthy with strong leadership skills. These attributes and more have been demonstrated through work, Scouting and a being on the committee of a large university club.
